author: Bel Trew, Bel Trew
title: Thousands rally in 'social distancing' protest accusing Netanyahu of destroying democracy
description: Demonstrators, wearing masks and standing 6ft apart, said the prime minister was exploiting the coronavirus crisis to stay in power
content:
Thousands of Israelis, wearing masks and standing six feet apart, gathered in a striking socially distant protest against Benjamin Netanyahu in Tel Aviv on Sunday night, accusing him of destroying democracy as the country battles the coronavirus.
